Product: ELV Aluminium Adjustable And Foldable Dock Mobile Holder
Review_Summary: Very nice and sturdy enough to hold mobile phones no matter what's the weight. I put a 10.1" tablet on it and it withstood very well. The folding rivets are reasonably tight enough that it stays right in whatever degree you put it. Soft materials are pasted suitably in places to protect the mobile from scratches. The stand base has four similar rubber pads that holds it firmly in place and prevents it from slipping from where it's put. A good buy for everyone. I bought for two of my family me...

Product: ELV Aluminium Adjustable And Foldable Dock Mobile Holder
Review_Summary: Anybody looking for a strong phone stand and able to connect the wire charger from down below, this is the right stand. Couldn't get a better stand than this one at this price. The stand is a metal body and perfectly sits on the desk and is adjustable.

Product: ELV Aluminium Adjustable And Foldable Dock Mobile Holder
Review_Summary: This mobile stand is made of metal. Looks and feels sturdy. Limited adjustin/folding options but then it is quite obvious in the display itself. The stand has to be at a proper angle so that it/ the mobile does not topple. No safety clip to secure the mobile in place, so you have to be very careful or your precious mobile could slip of the holder and fall. Again, it is apparent in the pics, so not disappointed. It could have been priced a bit lower. But overall it does what it's supposed to do.
